SEARCH
Package ViewModel2ManagerAdapter

Class ViewModel2ManagerAdapter

java.lang.Object
ViewModel2ManagerAdapter.ViewModel2ManagerAdapter
public class ViewModel2ManagerAdapter extends Object
Class defining the adapter pattern for interactions between ViewModel and Model layers. This adapter encapsulates various operations involving user accounts, tasks, and projects, enabling seamless communication between the ViewModel and Model.

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public Object createAccount(String username, String email, String token)
      Creates a new user account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the new account.
      email - The email address associated with the new account.
      token - The authentication token for account verification.
      Returns:
      An instance of CreatedUser representing the newly created account.

    • login

      public Object login(String username, String email)
      Logs in a user with the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      email - The email address of the user.
      Returns:
      An instance of Login representing the login session details.

    • filterTask2Manager

      public Object filterTask2Manager(List<Object> FilteredUserTaskList)
      Filters tasks and maps them to the task manager for further processing.
      Parameters:
      FilteredUserTaskList - A list of tasks to be filtered and managed.
      Returns:
      An instance of FilteredTasks2Manager containing the filtered and managed tasks.

    • createTask2Manager

      public Object createTask2Manager(Object CreatedTask)
      Creates a new task and maps it to the task manager.
      Parameters:
      CreatedTask - The task object to be created and managed.
      Returns:
      An instance of CreatedTask2Manager containing details about the newly created task.

    • deleteTask

      public Object deleteTask(int userId, int taskId)
      Deletes a specific task based on the provided user and task IDs.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to whom the task belongs.
      taskId - The ID of the task to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the task was successfully deleted.

    • updateTask

      public Object updateTask(int taskId, String newStatus)
      Updates the status of a specific task.
      Parameters:
      taskId - The ID of the task to be updated.
      newStatus - The new status to be assigned to the task.
      Returns:
      An instance of TaskUpdate containing the updated task details.

    • createProject

      public Object createProject(String title, String description)
      Creates a new project with the specified title and description.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the new project.
      description - A brief description of the project.
      Returns:
      An instance of ProjectCreation containing the details of the new project.

    • updateProject

      public Object updateProject(int projectId, String newTitle, String newDescription)
      Updates the details of an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project to be updated.
      newTitle - The new title to replace the existing one.
      newDescription - The new description to replace the existing one.
      Returns:
      An instance of ProjectUpdate containing the updated project details.

    • updateUserInfo

      public Object updateUserInfo(int userId, String newName, String newEmail)
      Updates the personal information of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose information needs to be updated.
      newName - The new name to be assigned to the user.
      newEmail - The new email address to be assigned to the user.
      Returns:
      An instance of UserUpdate containing the updated user information.
